aboutMe: Innovative and results-driven web application developer with 8+ years of experience designing, developing, and maintaining dynamic, scalable, and user-centric web applications. Proficient in full-stack development, modern frameworks, and cloud technologies. Strong problem-solving skills and a proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions on time and within budget. Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams to align technical solutions with business objectives.

education.degree: Master of Science in E & Tc
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

list: - Leading the project to manage delivery with quality on time.
- Spearheaded the integration of CI/CD pipelines using Docker, accelerating deployment times.
- Mentored junior developers, conducting code reviews and knowledge-sharing sessions to maintain high development standards.
- Designed and developed a high-performance agriculture platform using Reacts and NodeJS, increasing user retention.
- Migrated legacy applications to microservices architecture, improving system scalability and reducing downtime
- Wrote server-side and client-side code for client projects using PHP, HTML, CSS and JavaScript, specifically with PHP framework.
- Collaborated with UI/UX teams to implement user-centered design principles, achieving an increase in user satisfaction.
- Integrated third-party APIs (e.g., Stripe, Google Maps) to expand application functionality and improve user engagement.
- Converted mock-ups into functional web interfaces using HTML, JavaScript, and AJAX.
- Assisted in the development of content management systems (CMS) for small-to-medium businesses using PHP and MySQL.
- Implemented front-end features using jQuery and AJAX to improve interactivity and real-time functionality.
- Conducted debugging and troubleshooting, resolving issues to ensure seamless application performance.
- Developed components and connected applications with web services.
- Utilized WordPress and CodeIgniter to create user-friendly websites
